Wiegand 26-bit is the default format for uploading credentials. If a different

credential number and facility code of the desired fob or tag:
Call ButterflyMX Support while on-site to verify the data format.
After the ButterflyMX reader is installed and provisioned, scan a fob and share the
expected credential format details with Support: They will confirm that the format
appearing in the ButterflyMX OS matches the expected format of the fob.
